Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2013 09:27PM Lastchild13 wrote: Dear 2ndsister, Some hospitals have a breast care coordinator who can assist with the whole coordinating appointments with your treatment team oncologists, radio oncologists, breast surgeon, nutritionists etc. Also BRCA testing is expensive and some insurance does not cover it but a little known fact is that the breast surgeon can administer the test and provide paperwork to submit to see if your sister is eligible for a free BRCA testing (it all depends on income) I found this out from my breast surgeon and was eligilble for the free test. The results took about 2 weeks and I got the results from my breast surgeon. I wish your sister the best -- sending hugs.
Posts.Title: Sister just diagnosed; seeking helpful info 2ndsister 2ndsister
